response.overview: Kafila is an expedition: a journey from the edges of the desert to the Atlas Mountains. With the Library of Naciria a collective of artists and scientists discover an entry point into a network of interconnecting stories present in the landscape. Journeying through the remains of former civilisations, the experience of the film connects a voyage on foot over the course of several months, and encounters in the present moment, with the stories of the library. We are following the paths of travellers in time: an investigation into seeing how societies change, transform and adapt.
response.title: Kafila
